Class FormController

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.FormController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddSurveyAnalysisToExistingSurveyGUI, AddToCatalogGUI, CancelOrderGUI, CatalogGUI, ComplaintCreationGUI, ComplaintManageGUI, CreateOrderGUI, CustomerGUI, CustomerServiceExpertGUI, CustomerServiceGUI, CustomItemGUI, HandleComplaintGUI, LoginGUI, ManageCatalogGUI, NetworkManagerGUI, NetworkWorkerGUI, NewComplaintCreationGUI, NewCustomerCreationGUI, NewProductCreationGUI, ResultInputGUI, SelectOrderForComplaintGUI, StoreManagerGUI, StoreWorkerGUI, SurveyAnalysisGUI, SurveyExplorerGUI, SystemManagerGUI, UpdateUsersInfoGUI, ViewCustomItemGUI, ViewCustomProductsInOrder, ViewDelivery, ViewDifferentReportsGUI, ViewProductInOrder, ViewReportsGUI

    public abstract class FormController
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract base class for all FormControllers provides many common methods for the controllers

      • loadFXML

        public static <ControllerType extends FormController,PaneType extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane> ControllerType loadFXML(java.net.URL res,
                                                                                                                        FormController parent)
        Load an fxml file and initialize it's controller with his scene and parent
        Type Parameters:
        ControllerType - the type of the form controller , need to extend FormController(this class)
        PaneType - the type of the root element for the fxml that
        Parameters:
        res - The url path for the fxml file
        parent - the form parent form
        Returns:
        the initialized controller for the loaded fxml form
